title: T001.1 - Create repository layout and README
body:
ID: T001.1
Estimate: LO
Files: README.md, .gitignore
Description: Create top-level README and repository layout for modules.
Acceptance: repo skeleton exists and README describes modules.

title: T001.2 - Add GitHub workflows: CI
body:
ID: T001.2
Estimate: MD
Files: .github/workflows/ci.yml
Description: Add CI pipeline with lint and test jobs.
Acceptance: PR triggers CI and passes on empty run.

title: T001.3 - Linters and formatter configs
body:
ID: T001.3
Estimate: LO
Files: .eslintrc/.prettierrc (or equivalents)
Description: Configure repo linters and formatter.
Acceptance: lint job runs and reports.

title: T002.1 - IaC directory and templates
body:
ID: T002.1
Estimate: MD
Files: infra/README.md, infra/templates/*
Description: Create IaC directory and basic templates.
Acceptance: templates present and documented.

title: T002.2 - Define DB, storage, queue resources
body:
ID: T002.2
Estimate: HI
Files: infra/templates/*.tf
Description: Define templates for DB, object storage, and queue resources.
Acceptance: templates include DB, bucket, queue with variables.

title: T003.1 - Auth skeleton: login endpoint
body:
ID: T003.1
Estimate: LO
Files: backend/src/auth/*
Description: Implement login endpoint accepting Telegram token and issuing session token.
Acceptance: /auth/login returns token and 200 for valid telegram token.

title: T003.2 - Persist user on first login
body:
ID: T003.2
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/models/user, migrations
Description: Create user record on first login with default tier.
Acceptance: user persisted with telegram_id and default tier.

title: T003.3 - Tests for auth flow
body:
ID: T003.3
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/tests/auth/*
Description: Unit tests verifying login mapping and token issuance.
Acceptance: tests pass in CI.

title: T004.1 - Schemas/migrations: User/Project/Track/Version
body:
ID: T004.1
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/migrations/*, backend/src/models/*
Description: Define schemas and migrations for core models.
Acceptance: migrations create tables; CRUD unit tests pass.

title: T004.2 - Implement Job/Transaction/AppBalance/PriceCatalog models
body:
ID: T004.2
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/models/*
Description: Add billing and job related models.
Acceptance: models include required fields and basic CRUD APIs.

title: T005.1 - Admin PriceCatalog API
body:
ID: T005.1
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/admin/pricecatalog.*
Description: Admin API to list/update price entries.
Acceptance: admin can list and update prices.

title: T010.1 - Billing domain model and API spec
body:
ID: T010.1
Estimate: LO
Files: backend/src/services/billing/spec.md
Description: Design billing domain and API contract.
Acceptance: API spec reviewed and approved.

title: T010.2 - Implement hold/commit/refund endpoints
body:
ID: T010.2
Estimate: HI
Files: backend/src/services/billing/*
Description: Implement core billing operations with concurrency safeguards.
Acceptance: unit tests for hold/commit/refund and race conditions.

title: T010.3 - Transaction logging and audit trail
body:
ID: T010.3
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/services/billing/logging*
Description: Persist all financial events with trace to jobs.
Acceptance: audit log records all events.

title: T011.1 - AppBalance model and admin top-up
body:
ID: T011.1
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/services/app_balance/*
Description: Implement AppBalance and admin top-up endpoint.
Acceptance: admin top-up increases balance and records transaction.

title: T011.2 - Threshold alerting integration
body:
ID: T011.2
Estimate: LO
Files: monitoring/alerts/*
Description: Alerting when AppBalance below threshold.
Acceptance: alert fires when balance low.

title: T012.1 - Adapter interface and config
body:
ID: T012.1
Estimate: LO
Files: backend/src/providers/interface*
Description: Define provider adapter interface and config.
Acceptance: adapter interface documented and implemented.

title: T012.2 - SunoAPI client implementation
body:
ID: T012.2
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/providers/suno_adapter/*
Description: Implement SunoAPI client with mockable layer.
Acceptance: unit tests against mock for cost and artifact URL.

title: T012.3 - Adapter error handling and retries
body:
ID: T012.3
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/providers/suno_adapter/*
Description: Implement retry policy and error classification.
Acceptance: transient errors retried; permanent errors surfaced.

title: T013.1 - Job submit endpoint
body:
ID: T013.1
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/jobs/producer/api/*
Description: Endpoint to submit jobs, compute credit cost and return job id.
Acceptance: endpoint returns job_id and required_credits.

title: T013.2 - Integrate hold creation on submit
body:
ID: T013.2
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/services/billing/*, backend/src/jobs/producer/*
Description: Create hold transaction when user submits job.
Acceptance: HOLD created and referenced by job.

title: T013.3 - Validate tier/feature gating and credits
body:
ID: T013.3
Estimate: LO
Files: backend/src/jobs/producer/*, middleware/featuregate
Description: Reject submissions if insufficient credits or feature not allowed.
Acceptance: submit denied with clear message if not allowed.

title: T014.1 - Worker scaffold: dequeue and state transitions
body:
ID: T014.1
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/jobs/worker/*
Description: Worker skeleton handling job lifecycle.
Acceptance: worker pulls job and sets RUNNING state.

title: T014.2 - Provider orchestration and artifact persist
body:
ID: T014.2
Estimate: HI
Files: backend/src/jobs/worker/*, storage integration
Description: Call provider, store artifact, record provider cost.
Acceptance: artifact stored and job marked SUCCESS.

title: T014.3 - Commit/rollback billing hold
body:
ID: T014.3
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/services/billing/*, worker code
Description: Finalize holds on success or release on failure.
Acceptance: transactions finalized correctly.

title: T014.4 - Idempotency and safe retries
body:
ID: T014.4
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/jobs/worker/*
Description: Ensure idempotent processing and safe replays.
Acceptance: duplicate deliveries do not double-charge.

title: T015.1 - Event bus schema for progress
body:
ID: T015.1
Estimate: LO
Files: backend/src/events/README.md
Description: Define event schema for progress updates.
Acceptance: schema documented.

title: T015.2 - Worker progress emissions
body:
ID: T015.2
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/jobs/worker/*, backend/src/events/*
Description: Emit progress milestones from worker.
Acceptance: milestones published and consumable.

title: T015.3 - Mini App subscription/polling
body:
ID: T015.3
Estimate: MD
Files: miniapp/src, backend/src/events/*
Description: Implement WS or polling to surface progress to clients.
Acceptance: client shows progress updates in UI.

title: T016.1 - Daily reconciliation job
body:
ID: T016.1
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/jobs/reconcile/*
Description: Compare provider invoices to recorded job costs.
Acceptance: reconciliation report generated.

title: T016.2 - Automated adjustments and alerts
body:
ID: T016.2
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/jobs/reconcile/*, monitoring/*
Description: Create adjustments and alert admins on variances.
Acceptance: transactions adjusted and alerts created when threshold exceeded.

title: T020.1 - Bot command parsing and auth
body:
ID: T020.1
Estimate: LO
Files: backend/src/bot/commands/*
Description: Bot parses commands and authenticates users.
Acceptance: /generate accepted and returns job_id.

title: T020.2 - Bot map actions to job submit
body:
ID: T020.2
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/bot/*, backend/src/jobs/producer/*
Description: Bot submits job and queries status.
Acceptance: bot provides job id and status queries work.

title: T020.3 - Bot completion messages with deep-links
body:
ID: T020.3
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/bot/*
Description: Send completion messages with Mini App deep-links.
Acceptance: messages include clickable link to open result in Mini App.

title: T021.1 - Mini App project screens
body:
ID: T021.1
Estimate: MD
Files: miniapp/src/pages/*
Description: Implement projects page, generate modal, job list.
Acceptance: UI screens render and navigate.

title: T021.2 - Job submit flow in Mini App
body:
ID: T021.2
Estimate: MD
Files: miniapp/src, backend/src/jobs/producer/*
Description: Integrate submit API and show status.
Acceptance: user can submit and see job status.

title: T021.3 - Balance UI
body:
ID: T021.3
Estimate: LO
Files: miniapp/src/components/balance*
Description: Show user credits and pending holds.
Acceptance: balance updates reflect holds and charges.

title: T022.1 - Notification queue to Bot/MiniApp
body:
ID: T022.1
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/notify/*
Description: Queue notifications with retries.
Acceptance: notifications delivered reliably.

title: T022.2 - Notification templates management
body:
ID: T022.2
Estimate: LO
Files: admin/src/templates/*
Description: Admin editable message templates.
Acceptance: templates can be edited by admin and used by service.

title: T030.1 - Editor operation primitives
body:
ID: T030.1
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/editor/*
Description: Implement trim/split/merge/volume operations server-side.
Acceptance: operations produce new artifact and version.

title: T030.2 - Persist derived artifacts and versions
body:
ID: T030.2
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/editor/*, storage integration
Description: Save edited artifacts and create Version records.
Acceptance: new Version exists with parent reference.

title: T031.1 - Editor UI implementation
body:
ID: T031.1
Estimate: HI
Files: miniapp/src/editor/*
Description: Build minimal editor UI controls and interactions.
Acceptance: user performs edits and previews changes.

title: T031.2 - Save-as-version and browser
body:
ID: T031.2
Estimate: MD
Files: miniapp/src/editor/*
Description: Save edits as versions and browse history.
Acceptance: user can revert and download versions.

title: T032.1 - Analysis job type and worker hooks
body:
ID: T032.1
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/analysis/*, worker hooks
Description: Implement analysis job producing metrics and recommendations.
Acceptance: analysis returns metrics and >=3 recommendations.

title: T032.2 - Surface analysis report in UI
body:
ID: T032.2
Estimate: LO
Files: miniapp/src/analysis/*
Description: Display analysis report and recommendations in Mini App.
Acceptance: user can open report and read recommendations.

title: T040.1 - Admin auth and RBAC
body:
ID: T040.1
Estimate: LO
Files: admin/src/auth*
Description: Protect admin panel endpoints with RBAC.
Acceptance: only admin roles can access panel.

title: T040.2 - Tier management UI
body:
ID: T040.2
Estimate: MD
Files: admin/src/tier-management*
Description: Admin can edit credits/day, allowed models and save changes.
Acceptance: changes persist and apply to new jobs.

title: T040.3 - AppBalance management UI
body:
ID: T040.3
Estimate: MD
Files: admin/src/appbalance*
Description: Admin can top-up AppBalance and view history.
Acceptance: top-up adjusts balance and transaction logged.

title: T041.1 - Feature-Gating middleware
body:
ID: T041.1
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/middleware/featuregate*
Description: Middleware checks PriceCatalog and tier for access.
Acceptance: blocked requests return upgrade suggestion.

title: T042.1 - Daily credits grant job
body:
ID: T042.1
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/jobs/daily_credits*
Description: Grant credits on login/daily schedule per tier.
Acceptance: users receive configured credits after login.

title: T042.2 - Admin manual grants
body:
ID: T042.2
Estimate: LO
Files: admin/src/credits*
Description: Admin can grant credits manually.
Acceptance: manual grants recorded and reflected in balance.

title: T043.1 - Transactions listing and filters
body:
ID: T043.1
Estimate: MD
Files: admin/src/transactions*
Description: Admin can view and export transaction logs.
Acceptance: admin filters by user/job/date and exports CSV.

title: T050.1 - Unit tests for billing domain
body:
ID: T050.1
Estimate: HI
Files: backend/tests/billing/*
Description: Cover hold/commit/refund and concurrency.
Acceptance: tests pass in CI.

title: T050.2 - Integration tests with provider mock
body:
ID: T050.2
Estimate: HI
Files: backend/tests/integration/providers/*
Description: Validate provider adapter behavior with mocks.
Acceptance: integration tests pass.

title: T050.3 - E2E flow tests
body:
ID: T050.3
Estimate: HI
Files: e2e/tests/*
Description: End-to-end scenario covering submit->worker->artifact->notify->edit->analyze.
Acceptance: E2E smoke passes in staging.

title: T051.1 - Metrics export setup
body:
ID: T051.1
Estimate: MD
Files: monitoring/*
Description: Export queue length, job latency, error rates.
Acceptance: metrics available in monitoring system.

title: T051.2 - Configure alerts
body:
ID: T051.2
Estimate: LO
Files: monitoring/alerts/*
Description: Alerts for low AppBalance and provider error spikes.
Acceptance: alerts trigger on configured thresholds.

title: T052.1 - Idempotency keys for job submission
body:
ID: T052.1
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/jobs/producer/*
Description: Implement idempotency on submit.
Acceptance: duplicate submits are de-duplicated.

title: T052.2 - Worker retry/backoff semantics
body:
ID: T052.2
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/jobs/worker/*
Description: Implement retry/backoff and failure handling.
Acceptance: retries occur and refunds on terminal failure.

title: T053.1 - Secrets management integration
body:
ID: T053.1
Estimate: LO
Files: infra/secret-config*
Description: Integrate secret manager for API keys.
Acceptance: secrets not stored in repo.

title: T053.2 - RBAC and audit trails
body:
ID: T053.2
Estimate: MD
Files: backend/src/auth, admin/src/audit*
Description: Enforce RBAC and record admin actions.
Acceptance: audit logs for admin changes.

title: T053.3 - Rate limiting on public endpoints
body:
ID: T053.3
Estimate: LO
Files: backend/src/middleware/ratelimit*
Description: Apply rate limits to public APIs.
Acceptance: limits enforced under load.

title: T054.1 - Build and push Docker images
body:
ID: T054.1
Estimate: MD
Files: .github/workflows/deploy*, Dockerfiles
Description: CI builds images for backend/worker/miniapp/admin.
Acceptance: images pushed to registry.

title: T054.2 - Deploy to staging and smoke tests
body:
ID: T054.2
Estimate: MD
Files: deploy/scripts/*
Description: Deploy to staging and run smoke tests.
Acceptance: staging smoke tests pass.
